about_the_game:
EARLY DEVELOPMENT

WIDEN is still in early development stages with lots of temporary art and experimental gameplay.

WIDEN

Step into the fractured mind of Mason, an ex-military soldier haunted by past wounds.

After being heavily injured during the Iraq War, he finds himself in an eerie, seemingly empty city. But is it really empty?

While wandering around this city, time flies and starts to distort his perception. He encounters multiple disfigured figures speaking in cryptic riddles.

Piece together Mason's shattering story line, facing mind-bending horrors that blur the line between memory and madness.

GAMEPLAY

  • Survival horror - Outsmart or fight psychological threats

  • Iraq War - Relive life or death combat in First person

  • School life - Stitch together disturbing memories

  • Semi-Open World - Explore a haunting city and uncover its mysteries

EXPERIENCE WIDEN WITH

  • Detailed & stunning graphics

  • Immersive High end Sound

  • Gripping psychological horror that will keep you immerged

  • Story-driven puzzles

  • Enemies who will prey on your fear

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, Alcohol, Cigarettes, Strong Language, General Mature Content
